name: Normans Dream #StayHome
description:
Explore an immersive procedurally generated open-world, fight or become friends with some monsters and reach new planets - everything is possible in Normans Dream.

The perspective will appear from the top-down (The picure is not a screenshot of the game)

The following gameplay-mechanics will be implemented:

- Exploring

- Fighting

- Trading

- Farming

- Building

Depending on the planet, different monsters will appear. Some planets might be very dificult to reach and survive on, but might contain the best stuff. But the difficult planets can just be reached with good spaceships, which just players, who have already played for some time, are able to get.

Development on Normans Dream has just started, no final release date yet. 

Open-Alpha: Late Summer 2020

Make the game become reality and join our Discord: https://discord.gg/rkkUaZ
